scripts.offline: npm run build && sls offline start
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run start:local
scripts.prod:local: npm run setup:prod && npm run start:prod
scripts.offline:clean: rm -rf dist && npm run build && sls offline start --reloadHandler
scripts.offline:prod: npm run build && sls offline start --stage production
scripts.offline:prod:clean: rm -rf dist && npm run build && sls offline start --stage production --reloadHandler
scripts.offline:preprod: npm run build && sls offline start --stage preprod
scripts.deploy-app-dev: npm run build && sls deploy --config ./serverless-app.yml --stage development
scripts.deploy-app-preprod: npm run build && sls deploy --config ./serverless-app.yml --stage preprod
scripts.deploy-app-prod: npm run build && sls deploy --config ./serverless-app.yml --stage production
scripts.deploy-queue-dev: npm run build && sls deploy --config ./serverless-queue.yml --stage development
scripts.deploy-queue-preprod: npm run build && sls deploy --config ./serverless-queue.yml --stage preprod
scripts.deploy-queue-prod: npm run build && sls deploy --config ./serverless-queue.yml --stage production
scripts.deploy-scheduler-dev: npm run build && sls deploy --config ./serverless-scheduler.yml --stage development
scripts.deploy-scheduler-preprod: npm run build && sls deploy --config ./serverless-scheduler.yml --stage preprod
scripts.deploy-scheduler-prod: npm run build && sls deploy --config ./serverless-scheduler.yml --stage production
scripts.deploy-admin-dev: npm run build && sls deploy --config ./serverless-admin.yml --stage development
scripts.deploy-admin-preprod: npm run build && sls deploy --config ./serverless-admin.yml --stage preprod
scripts.deploy-admin-prod: npm run build && sls deploy --config ./serverless-admin.yml --stage production
scripts.deploy-test-dev: npm run build && sls deploy --config ./serverless-test.yml --stage development
scripts.deploy-test-preprod: npm run build && sls deploy --config ./serverless-test.yml --stage preprod
scripts.deploy-test-prod: npm run build && sls deploy --config ./serverless-test.yml --stage production
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run deploy-app-dev && npm run deploy-queue-dev && npm run deploy-scheduler-dev && npm run deploy-admin-dev
scripts.deploy-preprod: npm run deploy-app-preprod && npm run deploy-queue-preprod && npm run deploy-scheduler-preprod && npm run deploy-admin-preprod
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run deploy-app-prod && npm run deploy-queue-prod && npm run deploy-scheduler-prod && npm run deploy-admin-prod
